description: This thesis explores the integration of artificial intelligence into edge computing for IoT devices, improving real-time processing and reducing latency in data-driven applications.
A decentralized, tamper-resistant electronic voting system using blockchain technology to enhance security, transparency, and trust in digital elections.

theme: Optimization of GPU Parallel Processing for Deep Learning
description: Investigates techniques to enhance GPU performance in training deep neural networks, focusing on memory optimization and computational efficiency.

theme: Autonomous Drone Navigation Using Computer Vision
description: Develops an AI-powered drone navigation system that utilizes computer vision algorithms for real-time object detection and obstacle avoidance.

theme: Energy-Efficient Routing Protocols for Wireless Sensor Networks
description: Proposes new routing algorithms to improve power consumption and network longevity in wireless sensor networks, enhancing their efficiency in large-scale deployments.
